au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.name: L1=L2=20m_cent_xhires
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Drive detector to short position driveDet(19280,0) # Drive guide to ga config driveGuide(guideConfig.ga) # Drive entrance aperture to 60 (20mmEAp) driveEntRotAp(60) #set sample ap to 2.5 mm sics.drive('apx', 0) # Drive beamstops up selBs(4)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(37.75, 100) # Drive attenuator to 180 driveAtt(180)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(37.75, 0) driveBsz(257)
